pkgmetadata.longdescription: # cmake-file-apiThis library reads and interprets the files generated by [cmake's file-based API](https://cmake.org/cmake/help/git-stage/manual/cmake-file-api.7.html).## Requirements- python 3- CMake 3.14+## ExampleAn example can be found in the [example](example/script.py) subdirectory.## LicenseThis project is licensed using the MIT license.
